text: The Queensland Review is a peer-reviewed academic journal of Queensland studies published by Cambridge University Press. It was established in 1994 and publishes articles, interviews and commentaries on Queensland history, politics and culture.Griffith Centre for Cultural Research. Queensland Studies The editor-in-chief is Michael T. Davis (Griffith University). == References == == External links == * Category:Australian studies journals Category:Publications established in 1994 Category:English-language journals Category:Cambridge University Press academic journals
title: Queensland Review
